column5: I spent a few days up North in the Kirkland Lake area. Both my wife and I are from there, and our parents both live on Lake Kenogami which is right on Hwy. 11 N. I got out a few days to play with my new Lowrance HDS5 ice system and man is it sweet. In 2 days of fishing we ended up with 2 walleye, 12 little pike, and 3 perch. Here is the picture of the only ones that count. They were YUMMY.For got my camera at the house so no fishing pics.
Nicely done Nip Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice fish Blair!! I've never fished that lake, how's the scenery?  The ice is broken...I bet you are just raring to go for Jan 1st on Nipissing.
Nice were you using minnows Richard
nice going  got to love the Lowrance HDS5 ice system I know I do
Yep yellow 1/4 oz. jig tipped with a minnow.
Yeap that seemed to be the trick for me and my friend yesterday too   Great 'eyes Nip
great first fish!  I have family up in kirkland.  some good fishing up there!  Cheers!
Those look like some nice pics, good job. Glad to hear the kit worked out good.
i cant afford all that expensive equipment like an  Lowrance HDS5 ice system. so i resort to the old ways of the rednecks.....
They look good Nip. Just a day or two and back at it on Nipissing. Might be out of a boat though.
Or hockey skates if this rain only lasts a few days.
